Keywords: Armor , Latveria , Scientist
Real Name: Tony Stark
Special Powers
I AM VICTOR VON DOOM. AND DR. DOOM IS AN HONORABLE MAN!: When a friendly character within range is attacked, the attacker cannot positively modify or replace their attack value.
PUNCTURE-RESISTANT POLYMER CONSTUCTION FLAME RETARDANT CAPE: Defend, Invulnerability. Demon in an Armor can reduce penetrating damage.

Comments
March 5, 2022
Buckwheat
I have to say that I dislike the subdued colors that the painter used. I would have liked more lustrous armor and a vibrant cloak. I mean, it's Doom—gaudiness is appropriate!
March 5, 2022
mfSladeWilson
3-0, absolutely brutal on a 300 golden scientist team with Recorder #451, Psycho-man, affe Sunspot, and Daniel Berkhart (secret identity into Mysterio) Correction: Not 3-0 with this team, I don't think Real Name:Tony Stark counts toward #451's trait now that I'm rereading it closely.
December 29, 2021
HectorXV
In my opinion, I think this piece is a chase because it is a silver bullet to a very popular chase (Sky Tyrant + Power Gem). Perhaps WizKids doesn't want to upset a lot of their consumers by putting out desirable chases (Sky Tyrant) only to have those chases decline in play and value by releasing easily accessible silver bullets a few sets later? Moving past the Power Gem, Demon will shut down a lot of buffed up attack values and Sky Tyrant will need a new friend. Sky Tyrant value and play will see a decrease after Power Gem and this guy will increase the values and play of the Doom chases.
October 27, 2021
Goop
Basically you are paying 50pts for a TK, Outwit and trait that protects you from opponents pumping up their figures. Thats good but hardly seems chase worthy. He could have been a rare and nobody would have thought twice about it.
